com.ikueb.wallclock

Class TickingClock

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.time.Clock
      • com.ikueb.wallclock.TickingClock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WallClock, java.io.Serializable

    public final class TickingClock
extends java.time.Clock
implements WallClock, java.io.Serializable
    An immutable, ticking WallClock implementation that also extends from Clock.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • atUTC

        public static TickingClock atUTC()
        Provides an enum-based UTC singleton TickingClock.
        Useful for ensuring that there is only one Clock.systemUTC() returned per classloader.
        Returns:
        a singleton UTC clock
